::Striker::

Striker chuckles at Spears' outburst. "Don't worry, flying isn't too bad. The 
worst that can happen right now is a Predacon attack. Then we're most-linkely 
dead."

He puts the pod on autopilot and walks over to Spears, putting a hand on her 
shoulder.

"You'll be fine," he says, trying to confort her, "We'll get there in a few 
hours or so."
